title: Mismatched rendering for xaml pdf printing
body:
From WinRT to UWP, my xaml-generated pdf is not rendering the same.
See below the template of my button and the two different renderings. Correct in pages and designer but not when printing it to a pdf.
Code: http://s3.postimg.org/cttm2rmjn/buttons_code.png
In-app (classic page): http://s3.postimg.org/y27ak710j/buttons_ok.png
Xaml pdf printing: http://s3.postimg.org/52cw47ieb/buttons_nok_pdf.png

comments.body:
Find below my temporary fix, just adding <Border> tags and moving the alignment properties into it:
http://s30.postimg.org/e4l0vi9pd/buttons_ok_pdf_border.png
Looks like the alignment and sizing properties of the TextBlock are kind of partially broken during the pdf generation.
I did the same trick for a lot of TextBlocks. I was unable to have a good control on where they'll be drawn or aligned otherwise.
Am I missing something so big that I cant see it or is this a real bug in xaml generation?
